name: Assessing the Frequency and the Intensity of Marine Heatwaves in the Barents Sea
description:
Presentation on "Assessing the Frequency and the Intensity of Marine Heatwaves in the Barents Sea" delivered at the ObsSea4Clim - BioEcoOcean Clustering Event I, that took place on 11-12 March 2025 in Sopot, Poland.

The presentation was delivered by Ajith Joseph Kochuparampil (NERCI), presenting work done in ObsSea4Clim project.

This presentation was part of Session 3: "Marine heatwaves (MHW) in space and time: understanding thermal anomalies at ecologically relevant scales".
